summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2613, for the improvement of 12th Avenue South from the north line of Judkins Street to the south line of Holgate Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation; by constructing all concrete sidewalks necessary; by providing the proper sewerage, water service and fire protection; under Ordinance No. 30531 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
